body: Hey guys I'm new and i like chocolate and i am new i am so excited to start playing my friend arthur told me :)

title: Hello :D

replies.body:
Hello, welcome to Avicus! If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask me or any member of staff!

You can find the rules here:
http://avicus.net/rules

Enjoy your stay :)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Hey! Welcome to Avicus :D I hope to see you around in game sometime, make sure you say hi :) Be sure you follow the rules as well :D
replies.body_tagged: Hey! Welcome to Avicus :D I hope to see you around in game sometime, make sure you say hi :) Be sure you follow the rules as well :D

replies.body: Hello. I luv chocolate too. enjoy your stay

replies.body:
Hi Exe! Welcome to the Avicus Network :)
Don't be afraid of asking me or someone from the staff team about the server.
Make sure to read rules at avicus.net/rules.
Oh and if your stats don't load, just do avicus.net/stats/IGN.
Thanks and good luck!
